cast.overview: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.
cast.title: United 93

cast.overview: The life of an unsuccessful writer is transformed by a top-secret 'smart drug' that allows him to use 100% of his brain and become a perfect version of himself. His enhanced abilities soon attract shadowy forces that threaten his new life.
cast.title: Limitless

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Richard Bekins (born July 17, 1954) is an American actor best known for his role as Jamie Frame on the soap opera Another World (1979-1983). He has also made sporadic appearances on other series, most notably appearances as several different characters on episodes of Law & Order and Law & Order: Special Victims Unit. Bekins has mostly devoted himself to stage work since leaving Another World.

He also had a role in the 2006 film United 93.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Richard Bekins, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Richard Bekins
